title: Instalockers
body: What do you do when you win the call in norms and 2 other insterlock and be all x role or feed. I mean seriously. This community needs a post lobby report system for juvenile people who cant even obey call order. What ae you left with when two people mid or feed in a fame both go mid and both troll and you called the lane but opted another lane to avoid the conflict (yes that is 3 calls mid) I mean seriously riot you community is so childish and toxic it needs to be put in the time out corner.

replies.body: That isn't going to be an issue for too much longer, I am assuming that you have seen the new champion select. The new 'Ranked' Champion Select is also going to happening to Normals. From when it is going to be released, Normals is going to feel like Ranked, just without the pressure and the actual ranking of Ranked.
im a instalocker but if a person wants my lane an there a better mid/top/adc/supp/jgl champ then me then ill give em it
